entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
